name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Sr. Incident Response Engineer with over 10 years of experience in technical troubleshooting, incident response, and project management. Proficient in managing and securing systems using **Microsoft Windows Server**, **SQL Server**, **Active Directory**, **Exchange**, **SharePoint**, **VMware**, **Microsoft Hyper-V**, **SCCM**, and **MDT**. Skilled in network management with expertise in **VPN**, **Dynamic VPN**, **IPsec**, and **Remote Desktop**, ensuring seamless connectivity and communication. Adept at implementing comprehensive backup and disaster recovery strategies, and enhancing security through **MFA (Multi-Factor Authentication)** and **endpoint protection**.

Demonstrated ability to coordinate incident responses efficiently and effectively, with a commitment to customer service and maintaining compliance standards. Experienced in working with **Azure** and **AWS** for cloud-based solutions. Strong background in developing enterprise platforms, bringing a unique perspective from the **Full Stack Development** domain, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. Passionate about driving real-world impact through technology and dedicated to preserving system integrity.
